feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-19T21:55:23.426213Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;斯坦福大学校长因操纵研究而辞职，将撤回 3 篇论文</stitle>; <id>;https://stanforddaily.com/2023/07/19/stanford-president-resigns-over-manipulated- Research-will-retract-at-least-3-papers/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T17:54:40.414529Z</updated>; <link href="https://stanforddaily.com/2023/07/19/stanford-president-resigns-over-manipulated-research-will-retract-at-least-3-papers/"/>; <作者>; <name>;d集会</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dralley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://stanforddaily.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/2023.02.07_MTL-Departing-4.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：147px;" />;<br />;根据斯坦福大学周三上午发布的通讯，斯坦福大学校长马克·泰西埃-拉维尼将于 8 月 31 日辞职。在斯坦福大学资助的一项调查发现“研究数据被操纵”后，他还将撤回或对他作为主要作者的五篇被广泛引用的论文进行冗长更正。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stanford-president-resigns-over-manipulated-research-will-retract-3-papers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36790301" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Twenty.com (YC S23) – 开源 CRM</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791434</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T19:54:40.538371Z</updated>; <link href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36791434"/>; <author>; <name>;iFelix</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=iFelix</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Twenty 是一款开源 CRM，旨在通过提供出色的用户体验并满足小公司的需求来解决现有 CRM 的问题。他们计划在未来专注于三大功能，并通过提供托管版本。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-twenty-com-yc-s23-open-source-crm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791434" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;当开放变得不透明：开源硬件公司不断变化的面貌</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.adafruit.com/2023/07/12/when-open-becomes-opaque-the-changing-face-of-open-source-hardware-companies/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T14:54:40.54 0840Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.adafruit.com/2023/07/12/when-open-becomes-opaque-the-changing-face-of-open-source-hardware-companies/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Santosh83</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Santosh83</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://cdn-blog.adafruit.com/uploads/2023/07/changing_face_oshw.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;在过去 15 年多的时间里，开源硬件公司通过设计和发布数千种开源硬件设计，创造了一个蓬勃发展的行业。然而，一些公司最近闭源或推迟了文件/源代码的发布，引发了社区对开源未来的担忧。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-open-becomes-opaque-the-changing-face-of-open-source-hard ware-companies" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36770047" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;区分前端框架的最重要因素</stitle>; <id>; https://themer.dev/blog/the-single-most-important-factor-that- Differentiates-front-end-frameworks</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T19:54:40.541928Z</updated>; <link href="https://themer.dev/blog/the-single-most-important-factor-that- Differentiates-front-end-frameworks"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderb ong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;变更检测是前端框架的基本功能，框架作者对这一问题的解决方案决定了其他一切。 React 的变更检测范例很简单：应用程序状态在框架内维护，以便 React 知道何时重新渲染。 Angular 通过允许开发人员选择称为 OnPush 的不同策略，提供了摆脱默认更改检测行为的逃生口。 Vue 的更改检测方法略有不同，因为它适用于专门检测的状态对象。 Svelte 的变更检测方法是完全新颖的，因为它在编译时分析组件的代码，并在必要时精确地更新 DOM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-single-most-important-factor-that- Differentiates-front-end-frameworks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791506" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Cortex-M 微控制器上的异步 Rust</stitle>; <id>;https://interrupt.memfault.com/blog/embedded-async-rust</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T17:54:40.543143Z</updated>; <link href="https://interrupt.memfault.com/blog/embedded- async-rust"/>; <author>; <name>;图片</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=picture</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://interrupt.memfault.com/img/embedded-rust-async/future-lifetime.excalidraw.png" style="width: 220px; height: 245px;" />;<br />;在嵌入式软件领域，对高效、响应迅速的应用程序的需求不断增长。异步编程凭借其有效处理并发任务的能力，在该领域拥有巨大的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#asynchronous-rust-on-cortex-m-microcontrollers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36790238" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;校友的子女不再享有卡内基梅隆大学皮特分校的录取优势</stitle>; <id>;https://triblive.com/news/children-relatives-of-alumni-no-longer-have-admissions-edge-at-carnegie-mellon-pitt/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T15:54:40.545397Z</已更新>; <link href="https://triblive.com/news/children-relatives-of-alumni-no-longer-have-admissions-edge-at-carnegie-mellon-pitt/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Geekette</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Geekette</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-varnish.triblive .com/2023/07/6374799_web1_ptr-cmu1-071523.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;卡内基梅隆大学不再将遗产状况视为招生决策的一个因素。这一变化反映了大学在优先考虑校友子女方面立场的转变，这在精英大学中是常见做法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#children-of-alumni-no-longer-have-admissions-edge-at-carnegie-mellon-pitt" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36788274" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;选择类型的清单</stitle>; <id>;https://fonts.google.com/knowledge/choosing_type/a_checklist_for_choosing_type</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T17:54:40.552442Z</updated>; <link href="https://fonts.google.com/know ledge/choosing_type/a_checklist_for_choosing_type"/>; <author>; <name>;Paul-Craft</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Paul-Craft</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/nqSu2nuw9GjvoH4kvHFWNeKgmgJtUH5MXy8seoPFvTV A8z_dnotGfPeWjHSz" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;一个简单但全面的清单，供我们每次需要选择新字体时参考，每个项目都有详细解释。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-checklist-for-choosing-type" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36790280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;将 pytorch2+cu118 与 ADA 硬件结合使用，速度提升 50% 以上</stitle>; <id>;https://gpux.ai/blog/sdxl_50_faster</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T15:54:40.553850Z</updated>; <link href="https://gpux.ai/blog/sdxl_50_faster"/>; <author>; <名称>;vans554</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vans554</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gpux.ai/build/_assets/sdxl_big-KSFONQYT.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 136px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在较新的 GPU 上使用 cu117 进行深度学习的问题，并建议以 cu118 为目标以获得更好的性能。它还提到了升级到 cu118 的选项，可以使用 docker 基础映像，也可以升级 NVIDIA 驱动程序和 CUDA 版本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#use-pytorch2-cu118-with-ada-hardware-for-50-speedup" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36787473" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“没有出路”：视频游戏如何利用赌博技巧来吸引大手笔玩家</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/jul/14/video-games-gambling-big-spenders</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T15:54:40.555054Z</updated>; < link href="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/jul/14/video-games-gambling-big-spenders"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/e682fde3f5 87ba2eb80544a91276b14ebbd4c4f2/0_176_4000_2400/master/4000.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;手机游戏与博彩业的融合日益明显，游戏开发商使用类似的技术来吸引和留住玩家。这些策略包括利用损失厌恶、价格锚定、社会证明、VIP计划、热点状态、虚假稀缺和宜家效应。目标是将免费游戏玩家转变为愿意花钱进行应用内购买的高级玩家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#no-way-out-how-video-games-use-tricks-from-gambling-to-attract-big-spenders" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36787746" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WhatsApp 已关闭</stitle>; <id>;https://metastatus.com/whatsapp-business-api</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T20:54:40.556224Z</updated>; <link href="https://metastatus.com/whatsapp-business-api"/>; <author>; <name>;foobarbazpro d</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=foobarbazprod</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#whatsapp-is-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36793074" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;盐的生命和西南部殖民的限制</stitle>; <id>;http://commonplace.online/article/saline-survivance/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T16:54:40.559595Z</updated>; <link href="http ://commonplace.online/article/saline-survivance/"/>; <author>; <name>;Thevet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Thevet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://commonplace.online/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/5.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 144px;" />;<br />;Commonplace 是探索和交流有关美国早期历史和文化的想法的目的地。它提供对美国早期历史的深入分析，并探索物质和视觉文化、教育学以及美国过去的各个方面。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-life-of-salt-and-the-limits-of-colonization-in-the-southwest" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36776407" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;高级 Python 掌握</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/dabeaz-course/python-mastery</id>; <update d>;2023-07-19T12:54:40.560557Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/dabeaz-course/python-mastery"/>; <author>; <name>;a_bonobo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=a_bonobo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com /7201aa1c893c1ca8a9bf286374c1dc7330b4109b396d48382ef47ea77bd3f7de/dabeaz-course/python-mastery" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;以练习为导向的高级 Python 编程课程，十多年来在企业培训循环中经过了数百次实战测试。由 Python Cookbook 第三版 (O'Reilly) 和 Python Distilled (Addison-Wesley) 的作者 David Beazley 编写。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#advanced-python-mastery" target="_blank">;[sum mar]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785005" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Infisical – 开源秘密管理平台</stitle>; <id>;https://infisical.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-19T15：54：40.561607Z </更新>; <link href =“https://infisical.com/”/>; <作者>; <名称>; vmatsiiako </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vmatsiiako </uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>; <img src =“https://infisical.com/images/message”。 png" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 108px;" />;<br />;Secret Overrides 允许您在本地开发过程中为机密或敏感机密设置个人值。Infisical 提供主要语言的 SDK 和灵活的机密操作 API。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-infisical-open-source-secret-management-platform" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36788210" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;爵士乐比赛 (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://jazz-library.com/articles/comping/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-19T17： 54:40.564851Z</updated>; <link href="https://jazz-library.com/articles/comping/"/>; <author>; <name>;RickHull</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RickHull</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jazz-library.com/uploads/featured/_900xAUTO_crop _center-center_none/19591/Electric-Keyboard.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;伴奏是爵士乐合奏的节奏部分用来承载和弦变化、应用节奏风格以及补充其他演奏旋律的音乐家的爵士技术。它是“伴奏”或“补充”的简写。伴奏由节奏部分的和弦乐器演奏，通常是钢琴、管风琴或吉他。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jazz-comping -2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782201" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用 C 语言简单解析</stitle>; <id>;https://pencil.to ast.cafe/bunker-labs/simply-parse-in-c</id>; <更新>;2023-07-19T15:54:40.567015Z</更新>; <link href="https://pencil.toast.cafe/bunker-labs/simply-parse-in-c"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了为 ISO C99 中的“ini”文件格式编写解析器的过程。解析器被设计为简单、可读和纠错，使其在各种场景中都很有用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#simply-parse-in-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36788206" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Mini – 最小语言</stitle>; <id>;https://minilanguage.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T16:54:40.568371Z</updated>; <link href="https://minilanguage.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;aethertap</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aethertap</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://minilanguage.com/cliff.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：187px；" />;<br />;Mini 试图为人类交流创造最简单的自然主义语言。 Mini 具有简单的语音、无变形的语法以及正好 1,000 个单词的全球词汇，非常适合用作国际辅助语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mini-the-minimal-language" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36788783" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;磁盘是一堆位</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cyberdemon.org/2023/07/19/bunch-of-bits.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T19:54:40.570282Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.cyberdemon.org/2023/07/19/bunch-of-bits.html"/>; <author >; <name>;dmazin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dmazin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;磁盘或内存是“一堆位”，它减少了计算机的神秘性。在本文中，作者探讨了构成磁盘支持文件的各个位，特别是索引节点，并展示了如何解析和理解它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-disk-is-a-bunch-of-bits" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36787200" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;超越内向与外向</stitle>; <id>;https://www.vipshek.com/blog/interaction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T16:54:40.571344Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.vipshek.com/blog/interaction"/>; <author>; <name>;vipshek</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=vipshek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.vipshek.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Finteraction%2Fheader.gif&w=3840&q=75" style="宽度：220px；高度：164px；" />;<br />;近年来，内向和外向的概念越来越流行，但它可能已经达到了极限。许多人并不完全适合这两类人，而是属于中间性格者这一定义不明确的中间类别。考虑不同交互状态（例如一对一、小组和大组）的更细致的模型可能有助于理解人类行为。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#beyond-introvert-vs-extrovert" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36789010" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;很容易低估你的产品价格（2009）</stitle>; <id>;https://venturehacks.com/pricing</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T13:54:40.584498Z</updated>; <link href="https://venturehacks.com/pricing"/>; <author>; <name>;isp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=isp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://149348552.v2.pressablecdn.com/wp-content/themes/Cutline-1-1.4-2ColumnRight/images/venture-hacks-logo-white.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;根据 Steve Blank 的说法，产品的正确价格可以是 0 美元或 100 万美元。他分享了一个关于一位名叫 Sandy Kurtzig 的女士的故事，她的软件定价为每年 75,000 美元，后来意识到她可以要求更多。史蒂夫强调不要低估产品价格的重要性，特别是如果您是一名工程师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#it-s-easy-to-underprice-your-product-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36776939" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用 100 行 C 语言显示 HN：Gemini Web 客户端</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ir33k/gmi100</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T13:54:40.591783Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ir33k/gmi100"/>; <author>; <name>;ir3k</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ir3k</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ir33k/gmi100/master/demo.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;其他类似的用几行代码编写的Gemini客户端项目成功地展示了Gemini协议是多么简单。这段代码远非直截了当。但我心里有一个不同的目标。我尝试在 100 行 ANSI C 中包含尽可能多的内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-gemini-web-client-in-100-lines-of-c" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36786239" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </条目>; </提要>;
